thread.title: Home and Away star Pia Miller splits with husband Brad Miller | DailyTelegraph
thread.title_full: Home and Away star Pia Miller splits with husband Brad Miller | DailyTelegraph

author: dailytelegraph.com
title: Home and Away star Pia Miller splits with husband Brad Miller | DailyTelegraph
text:
HOME and Away actor Pia Miller has split with her husband of eight years, former footballer Brad Miller.
The genetically blessed couple, who were married for eight years and have a nine-year-old son together as well as another son from Miller’s former relationship, have called it quits on their marriage, however say they remain focused on supporting their family.
In a statement released to Confidential yesterday, Miller said: “After several months of reflection we have decided to separate.”
“Even though we’ve lived in different states for over 12 months, we have shared ten wonderful years together.
“Moving forward, Brad will be moving to Sydney so that we can continue to co-parent the children together. We will always be supportive of one another. We are, and always will be, a family.”
Rumours first sparked that Miller’s marriage was on the rocks when she was spotted out and about with Myer model Kris Smith, however after Confidential made calls to her representatives, we were told the pair were just be friends.
